attributes.action: Implement policy to improve dog breeding and responsible ownership in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
1) This would make sure breeders adhere to a standard
2) Passing a test prior to dog ownership may provide an opportunity for the individual to identify if buying a dog is right for them
3) Less access to potentially compromising breeders 
4) One government regulated organisation could manage the database to help improve standards of dog breeding. 
I don’t believe the dog is ever at fault, as the genetics and training methods are chosen and dictated by the caregiver.
attributes.background:
1) Mandatory breeding qualification
2) Licensing dog ownership
3) Ban all databases and social media that sell dogs online
4) Centralised database regulated by the government regulated body

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643631
Introduce screening process for dog owners
